abstract: The search function in the current version of Windows may not get the results you want at first glance, but you just need to dig a bit deeper.
snippet: The search function in the current version of Windows may not get the results you want at first glance, but you just need to dig a bit deeper.
lead_paragraph: Q. The search box in Windows XP was friendly and found things. The search function on Windows 10 is basically useless because it rarely finds anything I seek, including documents I worked on the day before. Is there a way to get reliable search results using Windows 10?

headline.main: Shining Light on a Windows 10 Search

abstract: A committee is under fire for how its members were selected. Several have financial ties to biotech businesses, potentially giving short shrift to health and environmental worries.
snippet: A committee is under fire for how its members were selected. Several have financial ties to biotech businesses, potentially giving short shrift to health and environmental worries.
lead_paragraph: The National Academies of Sciences, Engineering and Medicine are assigned by Congress to provide policy guidance to the government. The group describes itself as “advisers to the nation.” The advice often comes through written reports from scientific committees organized by the group.

headline.main: National Biotechnology Panel Faces New Conflict of Interest Questions
headline.print_headline: U.S. Panel Under Fire for Its Ties to Biotechs

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: National Academies of Sciences, Engineering and Medicine
